attributes.action: , in light of the recent and ongoing catalogue of grotesque failures executed by this New Labour government, CALL AN ELECTION IMMEDIATELY SO WE - THE PEOPLE - CAN GIVE IT A VOTE OF NO CONFIDENCE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have had the Child Support Agency debacle, the foreign prisoners crisis, the Criminal Records Bureau foul-up, the passports bungle and the farm payments disaster.

Last week, we learned that illegal immigrants had been given a licence by a Government agency to carry out security work - and now we have the data of 25 million child benefit claimants missing (presumed dead!)for the last 3 weeks with no sign of it turning up.  There's also been the tax credits fiasco (also involving HM Revenue and Customs) which cost the taxpayer at least £3bn, not to mention the fact that they seem determined to do absolutely NOTHING useful about the hatred for this country and its folk from Islamic extremists.

GET THIS BUNGLING LOAD OF INCOMPETENTS OUT NOW BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE TO SAVE THE COUNTRY!!
